Plot: In a bid to keep their luxurious condo from their significant other, a couple's break-up proceeds to get uglier and nastier by the moment.
Title: The Break-Up
Actors: Vince Vaughn, Jennifer Aniston, Joey Lauren Adams, Cole Hauser
Writer: Jeremy Garelick (screenplay), Jay Lavender (screenplay), Vince Vaughn (story), Jeremy Garelick (story), Jay Lavender (story)
